channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Leaves covering the footpath and litter, 28th December
item.description:
Leaves covering the footpath and litter it’s been like it for months this road and footpath often gets left like this hardly ever see any council cleaners down this road and around the area the area needs to be attended by the council better, always to many/much litter and fly tips and leaves everywhere.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Peterboat Close, Greenwich
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tip and piles of leaves everywhere, 28th December
item.description:
There’s piles of leaves everywhere on tunnel avenue by the red raddison, and fly tips in the same area the whole road needs looking at I would say and it could do with someone from the right department from the council to come inspect it, the road also needs resurfacing and needs to be checked more regular then it is currently as this current mess has been there for around 3 months plus.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Peterboat Close, Greenwich
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Noisy manhole cover outside Old Kent Road Fire Station, 28th December
item.description:
Manhole cover outside the Old Kent Road Fire Station is rocking and making a loud noise every time cars go over it. (It's between the Fire Station and 375 Old Kent Road.) Issue started 26th December 2025.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Old Kent Road, Old Kent Road, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerous front garden fence, 28th December
item.description:
The front garden fence at 3 Shirley Road is precarioulsy overhanging onto the pavement. The wooden fence is lose and moving, with very heavy vegetation.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 261, Main Road, Longlands, Sidcup, Greater London

item.title: Large front garden hedges encroach onto the pavement., 28th December
item.description:
Large front garden hedges overhanging in 38 Longlands Road encroach onto to the pavement, reducing the available pavement space by almost a half.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 38, Longlands Road, Longlands, Sidcup, Greater London

item.title: Mud after roadworks, 28th December
item.description:
Thames water had the road closed for repairs and dug a huge hole. There remains mud in the road gulley outside number 11 Cintra park. The mud was cleaned from the road and dumped in a pile outside number 13 Cintra park under the hedge on the pavement. The mud and dirt created by the works have created a mess outside number 15. Please arrange a cleanup of this dirt

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 13, Cintra Park, Crystal Palace, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Chatsworth Road at various locations all the way down to Christchurch ave, 28th December
item.description:

item.category: Fly-tip Small - Less than one bag

item.title: Westmoreland Rd - Litter, 28th December
item.description:
Full length of Westmoreland Road needs attention for litter - on pavement, hedge/fence lines, verges, gutters etc. Please can road be cleaned as looking untidy and unwelcoming currently, it would be appreciated if request could be completed properly the first time of asking. Thanks.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Westmoreland Road, Park Langley, Greater London

item.title: Excessively bright street lighting, 28th December
item.description:
Two Exceptionally bright Spotlights on building (corner of layard Rd Fenner Pl.). These shine directly into windows at back of properties on Banyard Road. Who owns this building? These lights are brighter than all other lights locally, are pointed horizontal and not shielded. Please look into this
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bermondsey, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dog mess bin is overflowing!!!!, 28th December
item.description:
The dog mess bin has been overflowing for months , it is hardly ever emptied and is overflowing and all around the bottom of the lamppost , I reported it to the caretaker who said it was reported but not his job and it is now getting worse , please can it be emptied regularly!!!!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stanbury Road, Nunhead, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
